types:type.name: albums
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type albums = {| statusCode: Number {"typeId": "int"}, message: String, searchCriteria: String, albums: Array<{| albumId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, albumTitle: String, genre: String, publicationDate: String, artistId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, groupName: String |}> |} {"example": "{\\\"statusCode\\\":200,\\\"message\\\":\\\"SUCCESS\\\",\\\"searchCriteria\\\":\\\"Let it Be\\\",\\\"albums\\\":[{\\\"albumId\\\":1,\\\"albumTitle\\\":\\\"The Beatles\\\",\\\"genre\\\":\\\"Rock\\\",\\\"publicationDate\\\":\\\"1968-11-22\\\",\\\"artistId\\\":1,\\\"groupName\\\":\\\"The Beatles\\\"},{\\\"albumId\\\":4,\\\"albumTitle\\\":\\\"Let It Be\\\",\\\"genre\\\":\\\"Rock\\\",\\\"publicationDate\\\":\\\"2000-05-08\\\",\\\"artistId\\\":1,\\\"groupName\\\":\\\"The Beatles\\\"}]}"}
